message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper deals with human activity recognition using computer vision and video understanding techniques, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The use of deep learning-based methods also suggests the machine learning (cs.MM) and machine learning applications (cs.LG) sub-categories. The investigation of optimal scalability combinations for resource-constrained systems suggests the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. Finally, the use of neural networks for recognition suggests the neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE) sub-category.
